description: Many kms of trails interspersed in the Conn Creek valleys. The trails are in a boreal forest environment which is a habitat for a variety of wildlife inluding, bears, fox, and marten. The terrain provides numerous changes in elevation which can provide for challenging run, ski or mountain bike ride.
directions: One of many trails in Fort McMurray. The trails are in an urban park and can be accessed from numerous points in Thickwood and Timberlea subdivisions.
title: Birchwood Trails - Cougar
